headline: UPS extends buyout offer deadline after low driver interest
summary: Driver subscriptions for UPS’s buyout offer are lower than expected, forcing the company to give workers more time to make a decision. The post UPS extends buyout offer deadline after low driver interest appeared first on FreightWaves.
